FAQ / Wave 4 / Battle Cards /
View On Teletraan1.net

Increased Durability

  1. Let’s say the upgraded character normally has 10 health. It gets upgraded with Increased Durability, then gets 12 damage counters. If Increased Durability is scrapped, what happens? [Source: WotC]
    Any time the game notices a character with a number of damage counters equal to or greater than its current health, the character is KO’d. So your character is KO’d. Sorry.
  2. What happens if I Reprocess to Scrap an Increased Durability on a character with 3 health remaining? [Source: Aequitas]
    The Increased Durability is scrapped and the character is then KO'd. As the character is now in the KO area, the repair does not happen.
